19: כַּסְפָּ֞ם <sup>3701 </sup> <n>their silver</n> בַּחוּצ֣וֹת <sup>2351 </sup> <n>in the streets</n> יַשְׁלִ֗יכוּ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>They shall cast</n> וּזְהָבָם֮ <sup>2091 </sup> <n>and their gold</n> לְנִדָּ֣ה <sup>5079 </sup> <n>shall be removed</n> יִֽהְיֶה֒ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> כַּסְפָּ֨ם <sup>3701 </sup> <n>their silver</n> וּזְהָבָ֜ם <sup>2091 </sup> <n>and their gold</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> יוּכַ֣ל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>shall not be able</n> לְהַצִּילָ֗ם <sup>5337 </sup> <n>to deliver</n> בְּיוֹם֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>them in the day</n> עֶבְרַ֣ת <sup>5678 </sup> <n>of the wrath</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> נַפְשָׁם֙ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>their souls</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יְשַׂבֵּ֔עוּ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>they shall not satisfy</n> וּמֵעֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>4578 </sup> <n>their bowels</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> יְמַלֵּ֑אוּ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>neither fill</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מִכְשׁ֥וֹל <sup>4383 </sup> <n>because it is the stumblingblock</n> עֲוֹנָ֖ם <sup>5771 </sup> <n>of their iniquity</n> הָיָֽה׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has become</n>
20: וּצְבִ֤י <sup>6643 </sup> <n>As for the beauty</n> עֶדְיוֹ֙ <sup>5716 </sup> <n>of his ornament</n> לְגָא֣וֹן <sup>1347 </sup> <n>it in majesty</n> שָׂמָ֔הוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>he set</n> וְצַלְמֵ֧י <sup>6754 </sup> <n>the images</n> תוֹעֲבֹתָ֛ם <sup>8441 </sup> <n>of their abominations</n> שִׁקּוּצֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>8251 </sup> <n>[and] of their detestable things</n> עָ֣שׂוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>but they made</n> ב֑וֹ עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֛ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> נְתַתִּ֥יו <sup>5414 </sup> <n>therein therefore have I set</n> לָהֶ֖ם לְנִדָּֽה׃ <sup>5079 </sup> <n>it far</n>
21: וּנְתַתִּ֤יו <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will give</n> בְּיַֽד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>it into the hands</n> הַזָּרִים֙ <sup>2114 </sup> <n>of the strangers</n> לָבַ֔ז <sup>957 </sup> <n>for a prey</n> וּלְרִשְׁעֵ֥י <sup>7563 </sup> <n>and to the wicked</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> לְשָׁלָ֑ל <sup>7998 </sup> <n>for a spoil</n> [וְחִלְּלֻהָ כ] (וְחִלְּלֽוּהוּ׃ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>begin</n> ק)
22: וַהֲסִבּוֹתִ֤י <sup>5437 </sup> <n>will I turn</n> פָנַי֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>My face</n> מֵהֶ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>and they</n> וְחִלְּל֖וּ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>also from them and they shall pollute</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> צְפוּנִ֑י <sup>6845 </sup> <n>my secret</n> וּבָאוּ־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall enter</n> בָ֥הּ פָּרִיצִ֖ים <sup>6530 </sup> <n>[place] for the robbers</n> וְחִלְּלֽוּהָ׃ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>into it and defile</n> פ
23: עֲשֵׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Make</n> הָֽרַתּ֑וֹק <sup>7569 </sup> <n>a chain</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הָאָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>for the land</n> מָֽלְאָה֙ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>is full</n> מִשְׁפַּ֣ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>crimes</n> דָּמִ֔ים <sup>1818 </sup> <n>of bloody</n> וְהָעִ֖יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>and the city</n> מָלְאָ֥ה <sup>4390 </sup> <n>is full</n> חָמָֽס׃ <sup>2555 </sup> <n>of violence</n>
24: וְהֵֽבֵאתִי֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>Wherefore I will bring</n> רָעֵ֣י <sup>7451 </sup> <n>the worst</n> גוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> וְיָרְשׁ֖וּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>and they shall possess</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בָּֽתֵּיהֶ֑ם <sup>1004 </sup> <n>their houses</n> וְהִשְׁבַּתִּי֙ <sup>7673 </sup> <n>to cease</n> גְּא֣וֹן <sup>1347 </sup> <n>I will also make the pomp</n> עַזִּ֔ים <sup>5794 </sup> <n>of the strong</n> וְנִחֲל֖וּ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>will be profaned</n> מְקַֽדְשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <sup>6942 </sup> <n>and their holy places</n>
25: קְפָ֖דָה־ <sup>7089 </sup> <n>Destruction</n> בָ֑א <sup>935 </sup> <n>cometh</n> וּבִקְשׁ֥וּ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>and they shall seek</n> שָׁל֖וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n> וָאָֽיִן׃ <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n>
26: הֹוָ֤ה <sup>1943 </sup> <n>Mischief</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> הֹוָה֙ <sup>1943 </sup> <n>upon mischief</n> תָּב֔וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> וּשְׁמֻעָ֥ה <sup>8052 </sup> <n>and rumour</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>will be upon</n> שְׁמוּעָ֖ה <sup>8052 </sup> <n>shall be upon rumour</n> תִּֽהְיֶ֑ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> וּבִקְשׁ֤וּ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>then shall they seek</n> חָזוֹן֙ <sup>2377 </sup> <n>a vision</n> מִנָּבִ֔יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>of the prophet</n> וְתוֹרָה֙ <sup>8451 </sup> <n>but the law</n> תֹּאבַ֣ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>shall perish</n> מִכֹּהֵ֔ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>from the priest</n> וְעֵצָ֖ה <sup>6098 </sup> <n>and counsel</n> מִזְּקֵנִֽים׃ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>from the ancients</n>
27: הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>The king</n> יִתְאַבָּ֗ל <sup>56 </sup> <n>shall mourn</n> וְנָשִׂיא֙ <sup>5387 </sup> <n>and the prince</n> יִלְבַּ֣שׁ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>shall be clothed</n> שְׁמָמָ֔ה <sup>8077 </sup> <n>with desolation</n> וִידֵ֥י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>and the hands</n> עַם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> תִּבָּהַ֑לְנָה <sup>926 </sup> <n>shall be troubled</n> מִדַּרְכָּ֞ם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>unto them after their way</n> אֶעֱשֶׂ֤ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>I will do</n> אוֹתָם֙ <sup>853 </sup> וּבְמִשְׁפְּטֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and according to their deserts</n> אֶשְׁפְּטֵ֔ם <sup>8199 </sup> <n>will I judge</n> וְיָדְע֖וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>them and they shall know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n> פ
